newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Yeltsin orders Zaire evacuation plan prepared.
newsitem.headline: Yeltsin orders Zaire evacuation plan prepared.

text.p: President Boris Yeltsin ordered officials on Wednesday to prepare for a possible evacuation of Russian nationals from Zaire, a Kremlin spokesman said.
He told Reuters the precaution was prompted by the worsening security situation. Rebel forces have continued to advance and pressure has increased on President Mobutu Sese Seko to quit.

No timetable has been set for any evacuation, the Kremlin spokesman said. He could not say how many Russian citizens were in Zaire. Nationals of other former Soviet states would be able to take part in any Russian evacuation operation, he said.
